flavor: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

name: Ozruk
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

name: Runaway Blackwing
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ndeal 9 damage to a\nrandom enemy minion.
flavor: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: Sathrovarr
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to_your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."
howToGet: Unlocked at level 44.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

name: Soggoth the Slitherer
text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Ysera the Dreamer
text: Battlecry: Add one of each Dream card to your hand.
flavor: Quick! Quick! Write it down before you forget them all!
howToGet: Unlocked at level 50.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Big Bad Archmage
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

name: C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

name: C'Thun, the Shattered
text: [x]Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

name: Colossus of the Moon
text: Divine Shield\nReborn
flavor: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

name: Darkmoon Rabbit
text: Rush, Poisonous\nAlso damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Deathwing the Destroyer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Discard a card for each destroyed.
flavor: "He’s Deathwing? That one's Deathwing? You're Deathwing!? I'm DEATHWING! ARE THERE ANY OTHER DEATHWINGS I SHOULD KNOW ABOUT?"
howToGet: Unlocked at level 60.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

name: Faceless Behemoth
flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

name: Frost Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

name: Goldshire Gnoll
text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) less for each\n__other card in your hand.
flavor: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
flavor: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

name: King Phaoris
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

name: Living Monument
text: Taunt
flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

name: Mecha'thun
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you have no cards in your deck, hand, and battlefield, destroy the enemy hero.
flavor: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."

name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

name: Scrapyard Colossus
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
flavor: Heap on heapin' on.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavor: See?  Giant.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.

name: Ultrasaur
flavor: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
flavor: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Yogg take the wheel!

name: Arcane Giant
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each spell\nyou've cast this game.
flavor: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
